info.name: Mike Mitchel
info.intro: Highly skilled Senior Developer with six years of expertise in software development and a passion for crafting best practices code that delivers exceptional results.

experience.title: Principal Consultant & Senior Developer
highlights: Guided successful projects as the Principal Consultant for client stakeholders, delivering high value software and tooling.
Managed and mentored team members as a Senior Team Lead
Performed resource management and technical recruiting interviews
Championed and delivered best practices code
Delivered clean, readable, and maintainable code complete with tests
Automated testing via Continuous Integration and Deployment
Maintained documentation and best practices for the codebase

experience.title: Assistant Instructor
highlights: Assistant Instructor to 2 boot camp cohorts, teaching the same fundamentals I had just learned as well as developing an internal staffing app to record and manage student instructor hours

experience.title: Founder & Principal Consultant
highlights: Built a successful IT consulting business by delivering exceptional service, creating a robust referral pipeline
Managed every aspect of the business while being the principal consultant
Sold the client list to pursue web development

notableProjects.description: Refactored the entire customer order app, improving test coverage by 30% and establishing best practices code organization.
Full stack development across a multi-repo Access to Justice application with nearly 1 million documents produced per year: A2J Author, A2J Viewer, and Document Assembly Tool.
Full Stack medical video conference app for remote surgery and medical sales, Added high-quality snapshot feature allowing doctors to capture key moments including on-screen annotations.

education.studies: 60 hr/week intensive Web Development bootcamp that involved best practices fundamentals and building a greenfield project utilizing the YouTube API.

coverLetter.name: Mike Mitchel
coverLetter.content: I am very interested in your Senior Software Developer & Consultant position at Atomic Object, and feel I will be a great fit for the position. My technical skills and experience align well with the position, but I also bring strong personal skills from my experience Consulting for both IT and Development, managing projects, teams and high level client stakeholders.. I love the remote work option, but also appreciate that you are located in Ann Arbor as my wife and I just relocated here, and would love to be in the office, building rapport and connecting to the local community. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
coverLetter.trivia: I once paid my rent playing bass guitar in a full time disco band.
